title: STAR GUARDIAN LULU

embed.description: Find More Art Daily Deviations Critiques Critiqueable Wallpaper Random Random Deviant Random Deviation Random Group

body:
RIOT PLS.

Srsly tho, who else thinks Riot needs to hop on that Star Guardian train and get a crew going. We need more Star Guardians to protect Runeterra!

(Star Guardian Rek'Sai please)

replies.body: Make her purple and she'll look great!

Sorry to the original autor for editing his/her stuff.
http://i.imgur.com/WmRH51j.jpg
yeah, since they're based off of sailor moon, it would make each a different color just like the magical girls! :D she would obviously be purple cx
That is the best idea Riot hop on the star guardian train :)
Star Guardian Lulu and Star Guardian Jinx are all I want in my life {{champion:117}} {{champion:222}}
Jinx would be more like an ANTI star guardian, you know, evil magic girl and stuff.
HOLY MOTHER OF ADORABLE I NEED THIS ;A; also check out my champion concept Mina-The Artist Of Bandle, check out Update #2 ;3
glad I'm not the only one who thought of it! when I mentioned the idea in a match, pretty much everyone loved the concept. <3 i'd insta-buy the moment its released.
I don't think there was a sailor moon who had a pet? I'm not sure since I never watched theseries. But star guardian is really sailor moon skin.
